report.title: Occupied Squares Per Species
report.description: Report which returns a list of squares, and the squares include a plot where the species has been recorded.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN locations plot on plot.id=co.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN locations square on square.id=plot.parent_id AND (square.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id#) AND square.deleted=false #joins# WHERE co.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) AND #website_filter# AND square.deleted=false AND co.survey_id in (#limit_survey_ids#)

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_id
param.join: JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.taxon_meaning_id=co.taxon_meaning_id AND ttl.deleted=false

param.name: ignore_dates_before
param.description: Ignore data created before this data.

param.name: limit_survey_ids
param.description: Survey IDs to limit results to when all surveys are being returned by the user.
